description:
Create API factory for composable route group registration.

Currently: `packages/server/src/api.ts` defines groups individually (`AuthGroup` line 53, `IconsGroup` line 111, `HealthGroup` line 127, `TelemetryGroup` line 134) then hardcodes them into `ParametricApi` (line 140-145). Groups ARE exported but composition is fixed. `HttpApi.make(name).add(...groups)` is the Effect pattern for composition.

Deliverables:
1. Update `packages/server/src/api.ts`: export groups individually (already done: verify `AuthGroup`, `IconsGroup`, `HealthGroup`, `TelemetryGroup` exports)
2. Create `packages/server/src/app-factory.ts` with `createApp` factory function
3. Factory signature: `createApp<Groups extends HttpApiGroup.Any[]>(config: { name: string; groups: Groups; prefix?: string }) => HttpApi`
4. Factory implementation: `HttpApi.make(config.name).add(...config.groups).prefix(config.prefix ?? '/api')`
5. Update `apps/api/src/main.ts`: import `createApp` and groups, replace `ParametricApi` with `createApp({ name: 'ParametricApi', groups: [AuthGroup, IconsGroup, HealthGroup, TelemetryGroup] })`
6. Keep `ParametricApi` export in api.ts for backwards compatibility

Acceptance: `pnpm exec nx run api:serve` starts successfully. All existing endpoints respond identically to before refactor.
title: Composable API factory
